author: Staff Reporter
text:
A 14-year-old boy committed suicide by hanging here in his house at Aalahalli in Denkanikottai on Sunday.

The victim Sanjaykumar, son of Yashoda, was reportedly upset at having been left behind at home, while his mother went visiting his married sister in Bengaluru. According to the police, Yashoda took to wage labour after her husband died four years ago, to sustain her family of two children that included an elder daughter, who was recently married. On Sunday, Yashoda had refused to take Sanjay Kumar along with her to Bengaluru.When Sunday evening, Yashoda had returned home along with her daughter, when they found the house locked from the inside. The boy was found hanging from the ceiling fan. Sanjaykumar was in his seventh standard in Madakondapalli Government higher secondary school. Denkanikottai police have registered a case.
title: 14-year-old boy commits suicide
